author: PCGamer97
title: A nice little building game.
review: One of my first games for the PC, and it was a great choice! I like all of the pieces, vehicles, buildings, scenery; and so on to make a great LEGO world. Not much left to say other than what a great game! I still wished I got the limited edition LEGO man on a motorcycle...

author: NickBrick
title: I Got hooked on this
review: There ar'nt that many buildings but you can make your own Mini-figs.This was my brothers A looonnggg time ago, He got this and Lego loco but we lost loco.But when he moved out it was mine muuuhhaahahah! at first it looks a little boring but when you start making a big city it gets a lot more fun.One of my favorite parts of the game are the destructu bricks[Dynamite]You can use them to blow away entire building or have them just blow up half of a building so you can see inside.Majisto from the subtheme of castle Dragon knights will help you.One more little bonus is that after you install the game you play it without the disk having to be inside! over all probaly better for older Lego maniacs but I am twelve and its fun enough for me!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Video Games/PC) - LEGO Creator Review
review:
This game may be a good videogame but I don't think that this is the best one I've got. In this game you're able to create your own city with some buildings, vehicles and minifigs from the LEGO Town theme. The city could look cool and you can also bring it to life if you want to.

Pros

  • Nice way to build a city
  • You can bring your city to life

Cons

  • Could be boring after a while

Summary

All in all it's a great game to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.
